name: BACKWORDS Press
blurb: BACKWORDS Press: your favorite t-shirt as art, featuring more engaging words, and supporting more writers.

name: peculiar: A Queer Literary Journal of Utah
blurb: peculiar is a new queer literary journal that aims to showcase the prose, poetry, and art of Utah’s LGBT/Q authors and artists.

name: Vitality Magazine
blurb: Vitality is a lit mag full of awesome stories featuring lgbt+ protagonists, where the focus of the story is NOT their sexuality/gender.

name: Conclave: A Journal of Character
blurb: We want to create a journal that tells people that literature matters, that words can change the world. For the better.

name: The Purple Halo Journal
blurb: The Purple Halo Journal is a Creative Literary Journal of Art, Enchantments, Music and Soul

name: QUEERS DESTROY SCIENCE FICTION!
blurb: Queers Destroy Science Fiction! is a special issue of the Hugo-winning magazine LIGHTSPEED 100% written—and edited—by queer creators.

name: PEOPLE OF COLO(U)R DESTROY SCIENCE FICTION!
blurb: POC Destroy Science Fiction! is a special issue of the Hugo-winning magazine LIGHTSPEED, 100% written—and edited—by POC creators.

name: Paris Lit Up – Literature on Fire in the City of Light
blurb: Transnational artistic communities and independent publishing in Paris, the City of Light.

name: ONEIROCRITICA
blurb: The first issue of a new literary volume focusing on poetry, art, criticism, and non-fiction.

name: The Evergreen Review
blurb: The Evergreen Review was the heart of the Beat Generation. Now, it's relaunching. Join the underground!

name: Tour de Lovecraft: The Destinations - Cthulhu Mythos Places
blurb: Kenneth Hite's Tour de Lovecraft: The Destinations explores Lovecraft's settings and the hidden routes connecting his tales.

name: 2018 Goal Digger Planner.
blurb: Your Planner. Your coach. The ultimate 2018 planner to help you achieve your goals and live the life of your dreams.

name: The Good Journal - a quarterly literary magazine
blurb: Showcasing the very best new work from writers & artists of colour including essays, short stories, poems, extracts & illustrations

name: "Note The Word" Bible Journal
blurb:
The “Note The Word” Bible Journal - the space for easy and simple consolidation of personal notes on passages
of scripture.

name: The Willowherb Review
blurb: An online journal dedicated to diversifying nature writing

name: Tinted Window: A new journal
blurb: A journal focusing on one undervalued subject or figure in great depth. No.1 concentrates on the artist and writer Hervé Guibert.

name: OSSIAN, THE SECOND: the next issue of a new magazine
blurb: Help us release the second issue of Ossian, a literature and arts magazine publishing fiction, essays, journalism and comics.

name: Stellium: a literary magazine
blurb: A literary magazine that centers Black queer and trans creatives (but welcomes work from the rest of the QTPOC community).

name: F(r)iction Magazine — Storytelling Brought to Life
blurb: Support the next three installments of stellar literature and art

name: The Transformational Travel Journal
blurb: Your Guide to Creating a Life-Changing Journey

name: Apex Magazine 2021
blurb: A relaunch of the Hugo Award-winning genre fiction zine Apex Magazine.

name: INQUE Magazine.
blurb: An annual literary magazine with diverse global writing and extraordinary art, design and photography.

name: khōréō: a new magazine of speculative fiction
blurb: A quarterly magazine of speculative fiction by immigrant and diaspora writers, committed to paying pro rates from its first issue.

name: New OAK 2.0 Journal for Happiness, Creativity, Productivity
blurb: The upgraded 90-day journal that keeps you laser-focused on achieving your goals.

name: Filmmakers Without Cameras: A film and games magazine
blurb: Down to earth, thoroughly unpretentious, and easily accessible. Filled to the brim with love; a magazine made by the community.

name: Wakeful Travel: Psychedelic Integration Journals
blurb: Your next must-have tools to support your transformation through plant medicine experiences and world adventures.

name: Filmmakers Without Cameras: The Second Issue
blurb: A magazine about films and games written by people who like other things, too.

name: Apex Magazine 2022
blurb: Apex Magazine: A literary journal of science fiction, dark fantasy, and horror.

name: ScienceFictionery Magazine
blurb: A Full-Spectrum Sci-Fi Literary Magazine

name: Sleight of Hand Magazine
blurb: Independent literary magazine focusing on art, literature, and the human condition. Based in Rochester, NY.

name: Klang Magazine Munich
blurb: A linguistically diverse student-run literary magazine based in Munich.

name: Filmmakers Without Cameras: a film and games magazine
blurb: 150 pages of thoughtful writing and gorgeous illustration on the media we love

name: Fertility Tracker
blurb: Conception to Fruition Collection

name: Eavesdrop Magazine
blurb: Bringing a queer perspective into the world of publishing and literature through audio and visual mediums. Dedicated to equitable art.
